message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $11,500. I believe it offers significant value at this price, and I'm sure you'll be happy with your purchase.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're offering, but I'm looking to get it for a little less.  How about $10,500? That's still a good deal for both of us, and I'm confident this product will bring me a lot of value.

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $11,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go.  This product is truly top-notch and will bring you a great return on your investment.  What do you say?
